body_html:
So the problem is that 0.1.3 fix the problem in our CROSSTOOL file. here the problems are in TensorFlow's cuda support.

The fix in Bazel was bazelbuild/bazel@763f139
So applying the same change to third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL should work, that is
adding unfiltered_cxx_flag: "-fno-canonical-system-headers at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL#L110

Hope that helps!

Hope that helps!
body:
So the problem is that 0.1.3 fix the problem in our CROSSTOOL file. here the problems are in TensorFlow's cuda support.

The fix in Bazel was https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/commit/763f1397155fc7c12e1f1071a1bc942f91b867c4
So applying the same change to third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL should work, that is 
adding `unfiltered_cxx_flag: "-fno-canonical-system-headers` at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL#L110

Hope that helps!
